keyMappings:
# Extra bindings
map MT toggleMuteTab
map MO toggleMuteTab other
map MA toggleMuteTab all
map ) moveTabRight count=1
map ( moveTabLeft count=1

# Remaps
map F LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab
map R reload hard

# Vim compat
map <C-d> scrollPageDown
map <C-u> scrollPageUp
map <C-f> scrollFullPageDown
map <C-b> scrollFullPageUp
map <C-,> visitPreviousTab
searchEngines:
# Wikipedia
wiki: https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
wikii: https://de.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia Deutsch
wikt: https://en.wiktionary.org/w/index.php?search=%s Wiktionary
wiktt: https://de.wiktionary.org/w/index.php?search=%s Wiktionary Deutsch

# Dictionary
xlat: https://translate.google.de/#auto|en|%s Google Translate
leo: https://dict.leo.org/englisch-deutsch/%s Leo Dictionary
dw: https://www.dwds.de/wb/%s Digitales Wörterbuch
nihongo: http://nihongo.io/search/%s Nihongo
webster: http://www.merriam-webster.com/dictionary/%s Merriam-Webster
wie: http://www.wie-sagt-man-noch.de/synonyme/%s Wie sagt man noch?

# Coding
hn: https://hn.algolia.com/?query=%s&sort=byPopularity&prefix&page=0&dateRange=all&type=story Hacker News
gh: https://github.com/search?q=%s Github
npm: https://www.npmjs.com/search?q=%s npm
go: https://pkg.go.dev/search?q=%s Go pkgs
crate: https://crates.io/search?q=%s Crates.io

# Library
libgen: https://libgen.unblocked.vet/search.php?req=%s&res=100 Library Genesis
zlib: https://b-ok.cc/s/?q=%s ZLibrary
gr: https://www.goodreads.com/search?q=%s Goodreads
scholar: https://scholar.google.de/scholar?hl=de&as_sdt=0%2C5&q=%s&btnG= Google Scholar

# Multimedia
a: https://archive.org/search.php?query=%s Archive.org
web: https://web.archive.org/web/*/%S Web Archive
y: http://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s&aq=f Youtube
wer: https://www.werstreamt.es/filme-serien/?q=%s Wer streamt es?
spotify: https://play.spotify.com/search/%s Spotify

# Shopping
ama: http://www.amazon.de/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
review: https://reviewmeta.com/search?q=%s ReviewMeta
idealo: http://www.idealo.de/preisvergleich/MainSearchProductCategory.html?q=%s Idealo
heise: https://www.heise.de/preisvergleich/?fs=%s Heise Preisvergleich
wir: http://wirkaufens.de/index.php/search/search?query=%s Wirkaufens
zoxs: https://www.zoxs.de/ankauf_suche.html?q=%s Zoxs

# Other
maps: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google Maps
wolf: https://www.wolframalpha.com/input/?i=%s Wolfram Alpha

# Search engines
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
gg: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
s: https://startpage.com/do/search?query=%s&cat=web&language=deutsch Startpage
d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
e: https://www.ecosia.org/search?q=%s Ecosia
q: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
